Description: Enjoy this sunlight two-bedroom, two-bathroom with jaw-dropping, direct views of the Monument, freshly renovated kitchen, newly redone floors and new primary bathroom. Features hardwood floors, brand new primary bathroom with marble accents, tall ceilings, central air, en-suite laundry and private deck. Other amenities include access to a common yard, good closet space, large living room with wood burning fireplace and second bedroom that can fit a full bed. Avail 9/1. No pets. No smoking.
